tool_description: Validates network security configurations including firewalls, network segmentation, and access controls to ensure PCI DSS network security requirements are met.

network_config_file.description: Path to network configuration file containing firewall rules and network topology.

cardholder_data_environment.description: List of network segments that store, process, or transmit cardholder data.

validate_segmentation.description: Whether to validate network segmentation between CDE and non-CDE environments.

check_wireless.description: Whether to include wireless network security validation.

external_interfaces.description: List of external network interfaces to validate.

error_messages: Configuration file not found: Verify the network_config_file path exists and is accessible.
Invalid network configuration: The network configuration file format is not supported or contains syntax errors.
Empty cardholder data environment: At least one network segment must be specified in cardholder_data_environment.
Network segmentation validation failed: Unable to verify proper isolation between CDE and non-CDE networks.
Wireless security configuration missing: Wireless networks detected but security configurations are incomplete.
usage: Provide network configuration file path and specify cardholder data environment segments. Optionally enable segmentation and wireless validation. The tool validates network security controls against PCI DSS requirements 1 and 2.

firewall_compliance.description: Whether firewall configurations meet PCI DSS requirements

open_ports.description: List of unnecessary open ports that should be closed

network_vulnerabilities.description: Number of network-level security vulnerabilities identified
